description.message: Shows notifications when you get a new notification on GitHub and provides quick access in a popup.

footer_all.description: Button label to open the GitHub notifications page

footer_unread.description: Button label to open the GitHub unread notifications page

footer_watched.description: Button label to open the GitHub watched repositories manager

footer_index.description: Button label to open the GitHub frontpage

footer_options.description: Button label to open the add-on options

footer_participating.description: Button label to open the GitHub participating notifications page

markAllRead.description: Button to mark all panel items as read

logout.description: Label of button to log out from the extension

showNotifications.description: Label for the settings checkbox to control if the extension shows notifications

footerLabel.description: Label for the footer function select in the options

footerGithub_label.description: Label of the GitHub options group in the footer function select in the options

footerLocal_label.description: Label of the Local options group in the footer function select in the options

footerSelectAll.description: Label for the all notifications option in the footer function select in the options

footerSelectUnread.description: Label for the unread notifications option in the footer function select in the options

footerSelectParticipating.description: Label for the participating notifications option in the footer function select in the options

footerSelectWatched.description: Label for the watched repositories option in the footer function select in the options

footerSelectIndex.description: Label for the GitHub frontpage option in the footer function select in the options

footerSelectOptions.description: Label for the add-on options option in the footer function select in the options

footerSelectHidden.description: Label for the hidden button option in the footer function select in the options

markAsRead.description: Mark as read context menu item on individual notifications

unwatch.description: Context menu item to unwatch a thread (issue etc.)

ignore.description: Context menu item to ignore a thread (don't resubscribe)

token_scopes.message: The token must at least have the "notifications" scope. For private repos it needs "repo" to function correctly.
